story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_0300_10: Yeah. Are these all the materials?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Is that the Aether Foundation? Looks like they’re
setting up something weird...
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_0700_10: Stop dillydallying and get to work!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_0900_10: Hey! You’re from the Aether Foundation, right?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1000_10:
There’s a Pokémon in the sea I’ve never seen
before, and it’s hurt! Can you help it?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1100_10: A Pokémon you’ve never seen before?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1400_10: I see. Thank you for telling us!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1500_10:
We’ll gladly help that Pokémon, so hurry up and
take us to it!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1700_10:
What are you planning to do when you find
that Pokémon?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1800_10: What are we gonna do? Well...
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_1900_10:
If it’s valuable, we sell it, and if it’s strong,
we put it to work!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Isn’t Pokémon conservation the Aether Foundation’s
top priority?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Sometimes we don’t wanna do boring
conservation work.
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_2400_10: So what’s that suspicious equipment for?
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Let’s just say...it’s used to lure out some
unbelievable Pokémon.
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_3100_10: We need to ask this kid some questions.
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_3400_10: I’m gonna stand strong on this beach!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_3500_10:
Just like the guardian deity who watches over the
beaches of Poni Island!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_3600_10:
If you’re gonna stand in our way, then don’t
blame us for what’s about to happen!
story_alola_01_10000/2401_1001_3800_10: It’s the Pokémon I saw in the sea!
